meanings.definition: In no way; not at all.
meanings.sent1: She nowise wanted to go to the party.
meanings.sent2: He nowise understood the complicated instructions.
meanings.sent3: The cat nowise cared about the new toy.
meanings.sent4: The storm nowise slowed down as it approached.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's patience was nowise endless.

meanings.definition: In no manner or degree; not at all.
meanings.sent1: The project nowise met the deadline.
meanings.sent2: She nowise believed his excuse for being late.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick nowise fooled the audience.
meanings.sent4: His determination was nowise diminished by the setbacks.
meanings.sent5: The mountain nowise seemed conquerable in the fog.
